project.name: |-- 002-anonymous-vs-lambdas-for-runnable
project.description:
Keywords: + Lambdas, lambda expressions + Anonymous classes
This project includes a very simple example that compares the definition of a Runnable implementation using lambdas and anonymous classes.
LambdasRunner: Implements the Runnable interface named classes, anonymous inner classes and variables that hold a lambda expression and an inline lambda.
